body_html: I don't think we can resolve this without knowing the set of parameters you'll use in forward upfront. The problem is in broadcast_coalesced, which will compact them into blocks quite arbitrarily, and as long as a single parameter gets grad, all other will get zeros.

body: I don't think we can resolve this without knowing the set of parameters you'll use in `forward` upfront. The problem is in `broadcast_coalesced`, which will compact them into blocks quite arbitrarily, and as long as a single parameter gets grad, all other will get zeros.
